mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Bohart's Folly", "Whirlwind", and "Banjo Pickers Ball". ROUND DANCES "Kentucky Waltz", and "Kentuckiana". SPECIAL FEATURES "Well - Come to Kentucky", "Your Program for the National Square Dancing for Pre-Teens", "The Circus Party", "Report to the Readers of Sets in Order", and "Caller Round Up". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Square of the Month: Floyd & Magdalene Bohart", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Series: How Many Steps", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Paging the Roundancers: Herb & Lou Suedmeyer", "The Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", and "Calendar of Square Dancing News".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
